plot: What if Jesus came now, rather then when he did? We channel surf news reports surrounding the last week of Jesus' life, as seen through the eyes of the media. Rumors, facts, and half-truths...
title: Jesus 2000
plot_es: What if Jesus came now, rather then when he did? We channel surf news reports surrounding the last week of Jesus' life, as seen through the eyes of the media. Rumors, facts, and half-truths...
plot_en: What if Jesus came now, rather then when he did? We channel surf news reports surrounding the last week of Jesus' life, as seen through the eyes of the media. Rumors, facts, and half-truths...

produce.name: OK, Maybe a Little (but don't make a) Production
